document_data.name: Crêpe
document_data.mainbody: '''Crêpes''' were a type of dessert dish found in the [[Cormyr]]ean town of [[Immersea]].
document_data.Availability: Crêpes were a common dish, by standards of nobility, served in the [[Redstone Castle]] of Immersea in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, a noble scion of [[House Wyvernspur]], [[Giogioni Wyvernspur]], and his then-new acquaintance [[Cat Wyvernspur|Cat]], were served a meal of [[cheese]] [[fondue]], [[venison broth]] with [[noodle]]s, [[fish]] poached in [[wine]], and crêpes with [[boysenberry]] jam. Giogi was unimpressed with the meal but his guest, unaccustomed to such feasts, was delighted by each of the courses served by [[Thomas]], young Wyvernspur's manservant.
